{"games":[{"creatorId":4372130,"creatorName":"Gamer Robot | youtube.com/GamerRobot","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1456052,"totalDownVotes":97507,"universeId":994732206,"name":"[☀️☁️ UPDATE 17] Blox Fruits","placeId":2753915549,"playerCount":150109,"imageToken":"T_2753915549_8271","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"☀️☁️ UPDATE 17 Part 1 /  UPDATE OUT NOW 
New Fruit, New awakening, new island, new weapon, and MORE! Part 2 soon!

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 2200
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Kilo, Smoke, Spin, Flame, Falcon, Ice, Sand, Dark, Revive, Diamond, Light, Love, Magma, Door, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier, String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Shadow, Venom, Control, Dragon, and SOUL FRUIT

FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Do not exploit or auto farm, our auto-detection will catch you and we do not appeal our bans.","genre":""},{"creatorId":3959677,"creatorName":"BIG Games Simulators","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2183828,"totalDownVotes":144068,"universeId":2316994223,"name":"[❤️ Axolotls!] Pet Simulator X!","placeId":6284583030,"playerCount":168687,"imageToken":"T_6284583030_936f","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"👍 NEXT BIG CODE AT 2.5MM LIKES! ❤️💙

💖 Easy Games","genre":""},{"creatorId":1912490,"creatorName":"Onett","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1548295,"totalDownVotes":85489,"universeId":601130232,"name":"Bee Swarm Simulator","placeId":1537690962,"playerCount":32426,"imageToken":"T_1537690962_a8c9","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🎁 x2 Event: Join for 48 hours of x2 Pollen and Convert Rate to celebrate the new year. Complete quests for Bee Bear, Winter quests for all the NPCs, meet Dapper Bear and his Planter Pots and more.

Grow your own swarm of bees, collect pollen, and make honey in Bee Swarm Simulator! Meet friendly bears, complete their quests and get rewards! As your hive grows larger and larger, you can explore further up the mountain. Use your bees to defeat dangerous bugs and monsters. Look for treasures hidden around the map. Discover new types of bees, all with their own traits and personalities!

Join Bee Swarm Simulator Club for Honey, Treats and codes! https://www.roblox.com/groups/3982592","genre":""},{"creatorId":60596019,"creatorName":"Wolfpaq","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2648522,"totalDownVotes":401136,"universeId":1686885941,"name":"Brookhaven 🏡RP","placeId":4924922222,"playerCount":213292,"imageToken":"T_4924922222_4cda","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A place to hang out with like minded people and roleplay. - Defense Mode drops multiplied by drop chance, not yen!
- Bug fixes + balance changes + improvements ","genre":""},{"creatorId":1848960,"creatorName":"Nikilis","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":4944471,"totalDownVotes":425575,"universeId":66654135,"name":"Murder Mystery 2","placeId":142823291,"playerCount":41955,"imageToken":"T_142823291_8b7a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you solve the Mystery and survive each round?

MURDERER: Eliminate EVERYONE. Don't get shot by the sheriff.

Collect and trade hundreds of knives! 

Check out my profile for quick links to my pages! 
Like, follow, and subscribe for exclusive update news, free knife codes, and more!","genre":""},{"creatorId":5292947,"creatorName":"Top Down Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":933312,"totalDownVotes":74049,"universeId":1720936166,"name":"[UPDATE] All Star Tower Defense","placeId":4996049426,"playerCount":39575,"imageToken":"T_4996049426_1b09","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"⚔️Use your units to fend off waves of enemies

","genre":""},{"creatorId":29622,"creatorName":"callmehbob","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2590701,"totalDownVotes":335980,"universeId":321778215,"name":"Royale🏰High","placeId":735030788,"playerCount":30770,"imageToken":"T_735030788_21f6","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"♡Happy Valentines, Black History Month, and Lunar New Year!♡
✧~❄~✧~❄~✧

Welcome to Royale High, your ever-growing dream world!
✧~♡~✧
♡Use your Teleportation Sceptre to fast-travel across magical lands, with secrets to explore & fun games to play!
♡Games earn you the valuable currency 💎Diamonds, increases your level, & challenges your knowledge and skills!
♡Spend your diamonds in the shop, which sells special items during real-life seasons.
♡Dress your character to suit your mood & personality~ free makeup, hairstyles, & thousands of unique outfits for any occasion!
♡Level up at Royale High School by attending classes! The higher grades you receive, the more rewards you earn!
♡Make sure to bring the right book to class from your locker, and turn in your completed homework!
♡Try to balance your studies and socializing, as many best friends have been made within these halls♡","genre":""},{"creatorId":2782840,"creatorName":"Chillz Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2002044,"totalDownVotes":154356,"universeId":210851291,"name":"Build A Boat For Treasure","placeId":537413528,"playerCount":34758,"imageToken":"T_537413528_d6fc","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build your ship and set sail for your adventure!

🔷 Explore vast worlds, play many game modes, and mini-games. Battle various types of creatures known as spirits. Unlock and randomize many abilities, and awakens. Battle bosses for their unique Bloodlines and Abilities. Rank up and further your skill under mentors. Your Shindo adventure awaits!

🔑 Join for 2XP:
🔷 https://www.roblox.com/groups/1226491/RW","genre":""},{"creatorId":4294803,"creatorName":"Fireheart Studio","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":407879,"totalDownVotes":60438,"universeId":1650291138,"name":"Demonfall [2.9!]","placeId":4855457388,"playerCount":13704,"imageToken":"T_4855457388_e0ab","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Demonfall is based on the popular series Demon Slayer.

Ascend the hill with the power of humanity on your shoulder, and fight for survival along with your comrades; or head down the ravine to lose ones humanity, and live as a demon with unholy powers.
Fight, explore, learn, grow, eat, all common necessities and virtues of one, despite your path, in this world, its the survival of the fittest.

[Controls]
R - Unsheathe Sword
Tab - Menu Toggle Tab --> Configuration = Reset
M - Meditate [Skill Tree]
H - Toggle Emotes
Sprint + M1 - Lunge
Block + M1 - Shoulder Bash
C - Rush
G - Breathe
Q - Dash
F - Block","genre":""},{"creatorId":5348890,"creatorName":"Venture Lagoons","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":638080,"totalDownVotes":60080,"universeId":1451439645,"name":"[Update 3 ❄️]King Legacy","placeId":4520749081,"playerCount":26096,"imageToken":"T_4520749081_db05","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Join Dis for more code

Level Cap: 3300
There are 36 Physical Fruits In-Game

- Fruits spawn on the map every 1 - 2 Hours / Despawn 15 Minutes.
- First Time you join the game you have 0.1% to get free Conqueror Ability

Cr Clothing: Blotnik","genre":""},{"creatorId":4698921,"creatorName":"Da Hood Entertainment","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":632350,"totalDownVotes":290793,"universeId":1008451066,"name":"Da Hood","placeId":2788229376,"playerCount":16621,"imageToken":"T_2788229376_aeaa","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A difficult game, read below for tips.
Account has to be at least 10 days to play.

[PC/XBOX Controls][F/ButtonY - Block][E/PadDown - Stomp][G/PadUp - Carry][LCTRL+ButtonB - Crouch]
Crouch+Carry = Ragdoll thrown.
You can weave 100% if you time at the right time when blocking.

To gain muscle buy weights at fitness.
Eat lettuce to reduce muscle.

Cop: To join cops go to the police station, if you execute anyone without cuffs you'll be automatically kicked off. Use cuffs instead.

Criminals: Ransack banks and several others small time shops in order to gain wanted or cash.

Gun saves - however, can be lost by death, or logging when KO, or 0 ammo.

cash drop takes 30%

Game-Commands: "/e stats"","genre":""},{"creatorId":3229308,"creatorName":"Grand Quest Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":442270,"totalDownVotes":26275,"universeId":648454481,"name":"[💖VALENTINES💖] Grand Piece Online","placeId":1730877806,"playerCount":9771,"imageToken":"T_1730877806_428d","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":250,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"PC ONLY
Long awaited naval adventure experience. 

Work towards your ideal build, discover hidden locations, and challenge difficult bosses while competing with others!

Scavenge the lands for treasure and exotic fruits known to empower their eaters. Hunt the pirates, or side with them. 

Perhaps you'll join a crew, or better yet, make one yourself. 

2x legendary fruit rates are AUTOMATICALLY applied every friday-sunday

Miscellaneous controls:
M-Menu
Ctrl-Climb
P-Sit on ship
WW-Sprint","genre":""},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":3745140,"totalDownVotes":467695,"universeId":111958650,"name":"Arsenal","placeId":286090429,"playerCount":12863,"imageToken":"T_286090429_76fe","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Race to the top through a massive Arsenal of weapons! 

Conquer the day in fast paced arcade gameplay, from bazookas to spell books, each weapon will keep you guessing on what's next! 

Earn BattleBucks and trick out your game with a huge cast of characters, melees, kill effects, skins and more!

Join the ROLVe Community group for an in-game chat tag and 25% more BattleBucks and XP!","genre":""},{"creatorId":63700903,"creatorName":"Coeptus","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3955172,"totalDownVotes":420626,"universeId":88070565,"name":"Welcome to Bloxburg","placeId":185655149,"playerCount":27709,"imageToken":"T_185655149_9e67","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":25,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build and design your own amazing house, own cool vehicles, hang out with friends, work, roleplay or explore the city of Bloxburg. The possibilities are endless!

Version: 0.10.4
Update Log: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/--/361910","genre":""},{"creatorId":3194064,"creatorName":"Bizarre Studios®","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":843891,"totalDownVotes":92397,"universeId":1016936714,"name":"Your Bizarre Adventure ","placeId":2809202155,"playerCount":11528,"imageToken":"T_2809202155_cd90","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"✨🏹『NEW UPDATE v0.9』 🏹✨
➢ New trading system; Trade Stands! Trade Items! and multiple other QoL features
➢ 7 new Stand skins!
➢ 4 new Cosmetics!
➢ and more in game!

Welcome to Your Bizarre Adventure, an RPG-styled game that revolves around obtaining strong and unique spiritual abilities known as "STANDS", fighting gangs, and more! Read the help section in-game! JOIN OUR COMMUNITY'S SERVER LINK BELOW FOR CODES, UPDATES, ANNOUNCEMENTS, AND MORE HELP!

Give the game page a thumbs-up like and subscribe to our Youtube below for more codes:
➢ youtube.com/channel/UCwxB9DjiJKOcZbDPIvsCZBg?sub_confirmation=1

Disclaimers:
➢ You will be banned for any form of exploiting and there will be no appeals unless you have high quality video evidence that shows it was you getting falsely banned as it happened. It is highly suggested to use the applications "Medal" or "Shadowplay" to achieve this for your own safety.

Arrivederci!","genre":""},{"creatorId":3059674,"creatorName":"Badimo","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4824867,"totalDownVotes":650880,"universeId":245662005,"name":"Jailbreak","placeId":606849621,"playerCount":13918,"imageToken":"T_606849621_25a8","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🏁 The OFFICIAL McLaren F1 Event has begun! Drive the new MCL36 for FREE for a limited time, or buy the car to keep it FOREVER! 

February already! Our newest update is here!
🚀 - Season 8 has begun! With FUTURISTIC prizes including...
🤖 - The CELSIOR! Hover around in style. Free at Level 10!
🔥 - New GARAGE! With Favorites, Sorting, Grid view, and much more!
💰 - New Vehicle: The Badger! Find it at the Museum for 45k Cash!
☀️ - New Spring Map! Enjoy more colors than ever.



🏆 Jailbreak is an award-winning game played over five billion times where you can orchestrate a robbery or stop the criminals before they get away! Team up with friends for even more fun and plan the ultimate raid or heist. What role will you play? 

🖥 Programmed by Badcc. @badccvoid
🎨 Designed by asimo3089.  @asimo3089","genre":""},{"creatorId":12420072,"creatorName":"Lightning Dragon Studio","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":94483,"totalDownVotes":5484,"universeId":3262314006,"name":"[2x💧📦] Weapon Fighting Simulator","placeId":8554378337,"playerCount":18729,"imageToken":"T_8554378337_148f","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🥋 Welcome to Weapon Fighting Simulator 🥋
Weapon Fighting Simulator is a simulator game where you fight against enemies with weapons, spells and become the strongest martial fighter of all times!

🗡️ - Unlock new and powerful weapons!
🧙‍♂️ - Unlock new spells to aid you in battle!
🗺️ - Discover new worlds with different enemies and BOSS!

🔥 UPDATE [4.1]:
- Reduced the amount of Mythical and Eternal enchantment required. When you rejoin the game, the over-consumed weapons will be refunded.
- Adjusts on the enchanting UI.
- Fixed some bugs.
+ MORE, CHECK OUT NOW!

🌐 - Join the Lightning Dragon Studios group for a free "Fan" Nametag above your name!
👍 -  Thumbs up and favorite for more updates!

🚀 RELEASE CODES: weaponfighting, welcome, goodluck, happyday
🎁 NEW UPDATE CODES: trade, enchant
👍 75K LIKES CODE: likes75k
💖 NEW CODE AT 100K LIKES.","genre":""},{"creatorId":6556072,"creatorName":"Universe Time Studio","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":525832,"totalDownVotes":88308,"universeId":1782832995,"name":"A Universal Time","placeId":5130598377,"playerCount":9009,"imageToken":"T_5130598377_12c","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"❗ Welcome to A Universal Time ❗
🔮A Universal Time (AUT) is an action/adventure game inspired by many different popular shows, games, and animes. Most notably the Shōnen Jump Anthology's 'JoJo's Bizarre Adventure'.

📰 Current news:
- NEW SPEC (MERO MERO)
